item.title: Announcing the F# 3.1 Compiler/Library Code Drop ... - MSDN Blogs
item.description: The Visual F# Tools team at Microsoft contribute to F# through enterprise-ready tooling in Visual Studio 2013. We recommend the Visual F# Tools as the best, most productive and highly stable route for functional-first programming in the ...
item.dc:creator: dsyme

item.title: F# Weekly #48, 2013 | Sergey Tihon's Blog
item.description: Welcome to F# Weekly, A roundup of F# content from this past week: News F# 3.1 Compiler/Library Code Drop was announced! Don Syme ... F# binding auto-complete running in SublimeText 3. ... New cross-functional (F#, Haskell, …) ...
item.dc:creator: Sergey Tihon

item.title: Keith Bloom: F# in Finance conference - Blogger
item.description: On Monday 25th November I attended the F# in Finance conference at the Microsoft offices in London. I was drawn to this single day conference as I have been learning about functional programming for some time now. I am also interested in ...
item.dc:creator: Keith Bloom

item.title: On Excel Interoperation with F - fbmnds.clojure.blog - Blogger
item.description: Digging into the Excel interoperation facilities of F#, example code like F# 3.0 Sample Pack, FSSnip.net and projects like Excel F# Type Provider and Excel-DNA are first entry points for the topic. .... Porting Functional Code from Clojure to F#.
item.dc:creator: Friedrich Boeckh
